query:
ALTER TABLE watchdog_reports 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS resolution_notes TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS resolution_date TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS resolved_by_id INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS resolved_by_name VARCHAR(255);

ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS resolution_date TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS resolved_by_id INT,
